category: Member city/provincial sports association regulations/Article 28 (Duties of executives)
contents: Article 28 (Duties of Executives) ① The chairman represents the city/provincial sports association and supervises its affairs. ② The vice president assists the president and performs the president's duties when the president is vacant or has difficulty performing his duties due to an accident. ③ Directors form the Board of Directors, attend the Board of Directors meetings, decide on matters related to their duties, and handle matters delegated by the Board of Directors or the Chairman. ④ The duties of the auditor are as follows. Revised 2021. 10. 6. 1. Auditing the financial status of city/provincial sports councils 2. Auditing the operation of the board of directors and its work 3. When it is discovered that there is something unfair or unfair in the financial status or execution of business Reporting to the board of directors or general meeting. Revised on May 10, 2022. 4. Convening the board of directors or general meeting to report under subparagraph 3. ⑤ When an executive is indicted for a crime related to the operation of a city/provincial sports association or member organization. His duties are suspended. However, this does not apply in the following cases. Revised 2021. 10. 6., 2022. 5. 10. 1. When the statutory penalty for the indicted crime is only a fine 2. When a summary order is requested 3. When indicted as a negligent offender ⑥ If an executive If disciplinary proceedings are in progress due to an audit by the Sports Council due to misconduct related to the operation (including the Sports Association, member sports organizations, and city/provincial sports organizations), the person's duties will be suspended. ⑦ If an executive of a city/provincial sports association is arrested for a crime other than the operation of the relevant organization, his or her duties will be suspended. ⑧ If an executive of a member organization of a city/provincial sports association or a person representing a sports organization who has become an officer of a city/provincial sports association is suspended from his/her duties in the relevant organization, his/her duties as an officer of the city/provincial sports association shall also be naturally suspended.
